price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ntukumvire rero abagarariji mu kureka gushikiriza na kimwe mu vyo wategetswe; ahubwo nyabuna, uragira akigoro kadasanzwe mu gushikiriza ubutumwa bw’Imana Allah, uheze witange utiziganya mu kugondoza abagarariji ukoresheje Qor’ani.
arabic: فَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ وَجَٰهِدۡهُم بِهِۦ جِهَادٗا كَبِيرٗا

meta.transliteration: falā tuṭiʿi al-kāfirīna wajāhid'hum bihi jihādan kabīran
